outputs.output_descr:
The project outputs are as follows:
1) A Comprenhensive Strategic Development Plan of Parliament and a multi-year UNDP project document to support its implementation
2) Legislative functioning of parliament strengthened
3) Outreach and communication of Parliament strengthened
4) Functional (administrative and financial) autonomy of Parliament established
5) Monitoring & Evaluation

These outputs are intended to be in direct support of the Countrty Programme Outcome 'Governance structures are more responsive' and 'Creating an enabling environment for sustainable development'

project_title: Strengthening the Parliament of Trinidad and Tobago
